# Episodes

1. Metadata

1. Text

1. Code

1. Output


# In this session, you will:

1. Identify the basic anatomy of an R Markdown document.

1. Use the YAML to set up meaningful metadata and change output format options.
 
1. Organize and style your text using markdown formatting.

1. Organize your code using `knitr` chunk labels. (-->put in ~~workflows~~ graphics?)

1. Style your code's output using `knitr` chunk options.

1. Knit a document with updated data.
